class
defined in
stx.math.tween.TweenExtensions

Static Methods

animate(tweener : Tweener, duration : Int, ?frequency_ : Int, cb : Dynamic<Float> -> Void) : stx.Future<Int>

Tween.linear({x: 0}, {x: 1}).animate(1000, 10, function(intermediate) { trace(intermediate.x); });

endWith(tweener : Tweener, easing : Easing) : Tweener

Ends the tween with the specified easment.

startWith(tweener : Tweener, easing : Easing) : Tweener

Starts the tween with the specified easment.
